entry.string: Each configuration will load a predefined set of modules, menus, hooks etc. as well as create an initial configuration of the security system. On the next page you can change some of the options of your chosen configuration.
entry.translation: Eech cunffeegooreshun veell lued a predeffeened set ooff mudooles, menoos, huuks itc. es vell es creete-a un ineetiel cunffeegooreshun ooff zee secooreety system. Oon zee next pege-a yuoo cun chunge-a sume-a ooff zee oopshuns ooff yuoor chusee cunffeegooreshun.
